channel.title: ^&*%%@#**Problem with holding a gs + Can't get a special bar to Korasi**
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24dn4bd.png[/img]
I changed to my full screen client so I had to convert a lot of stuff. I've tried everything to get this problem gone. I was able to fix claws and all that other shit but the godswords are giving me problems.
Please let me know how to fix
- Also I cannot get the special bar for korasi to appear. Please help
~Marcbob
